statements: SELECT * FROM player_profiles;
SELECT username, level FROM player_profiles WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT username, experience FROM player_profiles WHERE level > 5;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE experience BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT player_id, username FROM player_profiles ORDER BY level DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT username, experience, level FROM player_profiles WHERE level > 5 ORDER BY experience DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT level FROM player_profiles WHERE experience < 1000;
SELECT player_id, username FROM player_profiles WHERE level BETWEEN 2 AND 5 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_players, SUM(experience) as total_experience FROM player_profiles;
SELECT player_name, player_level, player_score FROM player_profiles WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE player_score > 1000;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM player_profiles ORDER BY player_score DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM player_profiles WHERE player_level = 5;
SELECT player_id, player_score, player_name FROM player_profiles WHERE player_score < 500;
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM player_profiles WHERE player_level > 10 ORDER BY player_score DESC
SELECT player_name, player_level, player_score FROM player_profiles WHERE player_score BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY player_level ASC
SELECT player_name, player_level, player_score FROM player_profiles WHERE player_level < 5 OR player_score > 5000 ORDER BY player_name ASC, player_level DESC
SELECT player_name, player_score, game_level FROM player_profiles JOIN game_progress ON player_profiles.player_id = game_progress.player_id WHERE game_level = 3 ORDER BY player_score DESC
SELECT player_name, player_score, timestamp FROM player_profiles JOIN game_progress ON player_profiles.player_id = game_progress.player_id WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM player_profiles;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM player_profiles WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, player_experience FROM player_profiles ORDER BY player_experience DESC;
SELECT player_id, level_completed, score FROM game_progress WHERE player_id = 2;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM items_inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT player_name, player_level, player_experience FROM player_profiles WHERE player_level > 10;
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_level, player_experience FROM player_profiles WHERE player_experience > 1000;
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_level, player_experience FROM player_profiles WHERE player_level <= 5 ORDER BY player_experience DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_level, player_experience FROM player_profiles WHERE player_experience BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY player_name ASC;

SELECT player_name, player_level, player_experience, level_completed, score FROM player_profiles JOIN game_progress ON player_profiles.player_id = game_progress.player_id WHERE score > 500 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles;
SELECT player_name, level FROM player_profiles WHERE level > 10;
SELECT player_id, game_id, score FROM player_progress ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT game_name FROM games WHERE game_id = 2;
SELECT player_id, item_id, quantity FROM player_inventory WHERE player_id = 1001;
SELECT player_name, level, experience FROM player_profiles WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, game_name, score FROM player_profiles JOIN player_progress ON player_profiles.player_id = player_progress.player_id JOIN games ON player_progress.game_id = games.game_id;

SELECT player_name, game_name, score FROM player_profiles JOIN player_progress ON player_profiles.player_id = player_progress.player_id JOIN games ON player_progress.game_id = games.game_id ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT player_name, item_id, quantity FROM player_profiles JOIN player_inventory ON player_profiles.player_id = player_inventory.player_id WHERE player_profiles.level > 10;

SELECT player_name, level, game_name, score FROM player_profiles JOIN player_progress ON player_profiles.player_id = player_progress.player_id JOIN games ON player_progress.game_id = games.game_id WHERE player_profiles.level >= player_progress.level_progress;

SELECT item_name, quantity FROM items_inventory WHERE player_id = 3 AND quantity > 0 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
